contribute.title: Help Us Improve Zikr
contribute.description: Your contribution helps make Zikr better for everyone. Whether you're a regular user or a developer, there are ways you can help:
contribute.usersDescription: Help us verify references, check authenticity, improve translations, send your suggestions for new features or improvements, and report any bugs you encounter. Download our Excel sheet with all Azkar and send your contributions to our email.
contribute.developersDescription: Zikr is open source! Contribute code, fix bugs, add features, or improve the app. Check out our GitHub repository.
contribute.thankYou: Thank you for helping us make Zikr better for everyone!
